# cadence

**Instance Property**

The cadence the video processor maintains to process the request.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var cadence: VNVideoProcessor.Cadence? { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, the system processes every frame of video if you don’t provide a value for this property.

## Configuring Options

- **VNVideoProcessor.Cadence**: An object that defines the cadence at which to process video.
- **VNVideoProcessor.FrameRateCadence**: An object that defines a frame-based cadence for processing a video stream.
- **VNVideoProcessor.TimeIntervalCadence**: An object that defines a time-based cadence for processing a video stream.
